      count - The number of couriers to initialize
      Returns:
      A map containing the status and message of the operation

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      courierId - The ID of the courier

      Returns:

      @PostMapping("/addDelivery") @ResponseBody public Map<String,String> addDelivery(@RequestParam("pickupLocation") long pickupLocation, @RequestParam("deliveryLocation") long deliveryLocation, @RequestParam("pickupTime") int pickupTime, @RequestParam("deliveryTime") int deliveryTime)
      Add a new delivery to the system
      Parameters:
      pickupLocation - The ID of the pickup location
      deliveryLocation - The ID of the delivery location
      pickupTime - The pickup time
      deliveryTime - The delivery time
      Returns:
      A map containing the status and message of the operation

    • updateDelivery

      @PutMapping("/updateDelivery/{deliveryId}") @ResponseBody public Map<String,String> updateDelivery(@PathVariable("deliveryId") long deliveryId, @RequestBody Delivery updatedDelivery)
      Update an existing delivery
      Parameters:
      deliveryId - The ID of the delivery to update
      updatedDelivery - The updated delivery object
      Returns:
      A map containing the status and message of the operation
